basics.name: Stéphane Biard
basics.label: Data Analyst and Software Engineering enthusiast
basics.summary: Getting more and more into programming and data analytics in my daily mission while strenghtening the foundations with comprehensive learnings from the digital academy to become a profficient data analyst with a strong software engineering background.

work.name: AIRBUS
work.summary: Developing two services to share ontologies and access data through ontologies in order to provide capabilities to share information in contexts where stakeholders cannot agree on common data schemas

work.name: CAPGEMINI
work.position: Senior Solution Architect - Semantic Web of Things
work.summary: Member of the Center of Excellence for Digital Manufacturing, developing the offer for Industrial Internet of Things.

work.name: HCL / Geometric
work.summary: Functionnaly leading a team developing a platform based on Industrial Internet of Thing and Semantic Web technologies to aggregate shopfloor data and manufacturing processes planning to predict task completion and recreate a 3D as built view of a product.

work.name: ALTEN
work.position: Team Leader / System Engineer ATA 21 - Aircraft Air Conditioning Systems
work.summary: Member of the design office for Air Conditioning Systems ATA 21.

work.name: AIRBUS
work.position: Thermodynamic simulation of A350XWB Air Conditioning Packs - Master Thesis
work.summary: Modelling and computing numerically the behavior of the air conditioning pack of an aircraft that regulates air temperature and inject pressurised air in the cabin.

work.name: AIRBUS
work.position: Lessons learnt from Extended Entreprise on A350XWB - Intern
work.summary: Interview key program development stakeholders and gather the feedback about the implementation of new ways of working on A350XWB program in an Extended Entreprise organization.

work.name: Tolerie Industrielle Ingenierie
work.summary: Worked in a manufacturing company and got involved on various workstation from folding to packaging and painting

volunteer.summary: Travelling through Ireland in different farms to help in field and with animals

awards.title: Data Analyst Nanodegree graduation
awards.summary: Completed the nanodegree and final project submission and presented to the award ceremony the result of my project.

publications.name: Semantic Technologies - Making Sense of Data
publications.summary: Publication with 2 colleagues on our opinion and approach in daily projects to use semantic web technologies to facilitate use of data in digital manufacturing applications.

languages.fluency: Fluent but lack a bit of practice lately

projects.description:
Integrated to the System of System development team.
Built a model predicting crude oil availability by country until 2100 and associated price.
Tools: Python Pandas, Scikit Learn, Plotly, Seaborn, Palantir Foundry Slate app, Object Oriented Programming
projects.name: Oil availability and price prediction model

projects.description:
Created a pipeline to clean raw SAP BoM data and calculate different types of reuse between helicopters models.
Created an hybrid tree-bar chart visualization in D3js to analyse large BoM reuse results.
Tools: Python Pandas, D3js, HTML, Javascript, CSS
projects.name: Airbus Helicopters - Study of reuse in Bill of Material to enable mixed manufacturing lines

projects.description:
Programming services that allow to generate SPARQL endpoint on top of data injected into an ontology to create a knowlegde graph of a domain or an application.
Implementing consoles, automatic documentation generation and data cataloging to allow developers to discover the ontology through which data is exposed.
Tools: React, FastAPI, Python using RDFlib for manipulating ontologies.
projects.name: Ontology Based Data Access services

projects.description:
Preparing data collection to create ad hoc reports on the Entreprise Architecture modelling.
Tools: Postman, GraphQL, Python Request, Jupyter Notebook.
projects.name: GraphQL API exploration of the Enterprise Architecture platform

projects.description:
Research project to generate an As Built 3D status reporting based on data out of IoT from the shopfloor including Automated Guided Vehicles steering.
Tools: Thingworx, GraphDB, OPC-UA
projects.name: Semantic Web of Things - Helping Manufacturing Engineering get the As Built view

projects.description:
Refactoring an existing Innovation Lab demonstration of IoT using PTC IoT platforms Thingworx.
Creating Object Model, coding events' actions and building UI using widget based integrated solution.
Tools: Thingworx, Javascript.
projects.name: IoT connected extextend entreprise mock-up in Lego

projects.description:
Building test setup for hardware.
Running test on new air outlet design.
Analysing results.
projects.name: Air outlet calibration and test on real scale aircraft air distribution system mock-up

projects.description:
Processing raw data out of sprectrometer measures on aircraft.
Building analysis to identify which substances where present in the air and identify potential anomalies with regards to design requirements.
Tools: Excel, VB macros
projects.name: Analysing results of mass sprectrometer measurements for Cabin Air Quality assessment

projects.description:
Compiling tests to perform for each system based on configuration management through modification stacking.
Tools: FUN2 for GTR creation
projects.name: Ground Test Requirements for all Air Conditioning Systems

projects.description:
Generate design specification drawings and calibrate air systems based on airline chosen cabin layout.
Tools: Excel, Dymola
projects.name: Calibrating complete air distribution and extraction system for multiple airlines and programs

projects.description:
Design model of an air conditioning pack (turbo compressor, water extractor, heat exchangers and valves).
Perform numerical computation (convergence and initial conditions settings).
Validating model results against test bench data for different flight profiles.
Tools: Dymola, Modelica, Excel macros
projects.name: Thermodynamic simulation of aircraft air conditioning packs

projects.description: Various experiences to combine practice with therory during studies.
projects.name: Casting, welding, machining, bending

basics.personalDescription: After first 10 year of experience in Engineering, I have decided to focus on programming and especially the field of data analysis and artificial intelligence. My only concern at work is to contribute to a subject that is interesting and overall that will help someone and solve issues.

work.codingReason: I am having fun with it and I find it as concrete as buiding walls.

specific.interestedBy: Knowing that my work will help someone, and progressing on programming to have a strong competence that others can benefit of in many situations.
